name: d3fc-sample
description: A data subsampler that chooses representative data points using a largest triangle or mode-median approach.

scripts.bundle: rimraf build && rollup -c && uglifyjs build/d3fc-sample.js --compress --mangle -o build/d3fc-sample.min.js
scripts.test: npm run bundle && eslint index.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js site/demo.js && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=test/support/jasmine.json
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.site: npm run test && mkdirp site/lib && browserify site/demo.js -o site/lib/bundle.js
scripts.dev: npm run site && watch -p '{src,test}/**/*.js' -c 'npm run site'
